Texture/Model Sources
=====================

All models made in Maya for CS 409 unless otherwise specified

Skybox:
	http://www.keithlantz.net/wp-content/uploads/2011/10/skybox_texture.jpg (modified)

Disks:
A	http://webglbasic.com/compiler/textures/terra/terra028.jpg
B	https://i.pinimg.com/736x/7c/ed/f9/7cedf9ec43be0f62de970d6e1b0d63e3--grass-texture-texture-seamless.jpg
C	http://spiralgraphics.biz/packs/snow_ice/previews/Chiseled%20Ice.jpg
D	http://bgfons.com/uploads/sand/sand_texture1028.jpg
E	http://www.mb3d.co.uk/mb3d/Stone_and_Rock_Seamless_and_Tileable_High_Res_Textures_files/Rock_07_UV_H_CM_1.jpg

Characters:
The cbabe and guard models are converted from .mdl models provided with 3D GameStudio 6 example games.

Old Disks:
	http://www.mb3d.co.uk/mb3d/Stone_and_Rock_Seamless_and_Tileable_High_Res_Textures_files/Craggy_Stone_With_Green_Moss_Litchen_UV_CM_1.jpg
